About Me

Who i am

Hello ! My name is Alfredo, i am from Cáceres, Spain, i have the title of Network Administration of Networked Computer Systems and Specialist in Big Data and Artificial Intelligent

I’m a developer passionate about Computing Science who loves learning new technologies, methodologies and keen to face new challenges. Also, I’m a proactive person with a grea tempathetic capacity, emotional intelligence andgood communication skills, strengthening my team-work. Among my personal skills, I highlight my ambition, reflecting on myself and being very self-demanding, so I put them in practice developing my own ideas and projects in a creative and detailed way.

Projects

  • Degree's final project

    • The project was based on creating a virtual box network which contained 3 machines that acted as clients, one on Ubuntu 18.04 and one on Windows 10 There were also 3 machines that acted as servers, an SMTP server that also managed users through LDAP and DHCP, there was also a MySQL server which emulated as if an employee had to connect from a client machine I also had an FTP server which I served as file transfer for the entire network It also had two firewalls configured with apache and the rules Spyder owasp, and apache, they were also configured through the use of iptables And also two honeypots, one based on Ubuntu 18.04 and the other on Kali Linux






  • Project Software engineering

    • A project that the idea was to manage some objects (in this case they were fictitious hydroalcoholic gel cans) programmed in c ++ and manage them as if they were in the entire faculty It was all in c ++ to practice object-oriented programming in c ++ with eclipse
